name: Aussie Rules Pocket Footy 2
description:
Pocket Footy 2 is an arcade aussie rules game. It includes a basic season mode and controllers support.  Let me know what you think! Check out the Android version!

CONTROLS:

KEYBOARD:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move Player
F - Handball
SPACE - Kick
SHIFT - Sprint or Tackle or Play On

CONTROLLER:
It is recommended you install and run Steam to improve controller support

XBOX:
X - KICK
A - TACKLE
B - HANDBALL
LB - PLAY ON
RB - SPRINT
JOYSTICKS - MOVE

PS4:
SQUARE - KICK
X - TACKLE
O - HANDBALL
L1 - PLAY ON
R1 - SPRINT
JOYSTICKS - MOVE
